snippet: Archbishop Edwin F. O’Brien once served at a parish in the northeast Bronx and now works as the pope’s representative to Catholics in the Holy Land.
abstract: Profile of Archbishop Edwin F O'Brien, who once served at a parish in the Bronx and now works as the pope's representative to Catholics in the Holy Land; along with 21 other prelates, O'Brien has been selected by Pope Benedict XVI to be elevated to cardinal.
lead_paragraph: Archbishop Edwin F. O’Brien once served at a parish in the northeast Bronx and now works as the pope’s representative to Catholics in the Holy Land.

headline.seo: Ex-Baltimore Archbishop Edwin F. O’Brien Elevated to Cardinal
headline.main: Another Step Up for a Bronx Native Who Led the Archdiocese in Baltimore
headline.print_headline: Another Step Up for a Bronx Native Who Led the Archdiocese in Baltimore
